General.Name: Binect AG
General.Description: Binect AG provides software and service platform for the digitization of various business document and receipt logistics in Germany. It develops and integrates digital modules and services for medium-sized companies, authorities, and other institutions. The company was formerly known as MAX 21 AG and changed its name to Binect AG in August 2021. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Weiterstadt, Germany.
